name: City Horror Espace
description:
City Horror Espace is short school projet and a third-person horror game in virtual reality.

The player play as a nightmarish character in which he must walk through cities around the world plunged in the dark. His objective is to recover the artifacts hidden in the levels in order to wake up. Enemies camouflaged in the dark will prevent the player from advancing. To fight against them, the player will use his flashlight to make them visible and vulnerable.
